JOB DESCRIPTION: What you ll be doing:       Contributing to all aspects of the services under the team s ownership, which includes design, implementation, refactoring, automated testing, deployment, and uptime of the services       Helping set the vision of the services under the team's ownership       Building the technology by well-tested services that gradually grow over time, and that provide plenty of insight into production performance     What we re looking for   Relevant JavaScalaJavascript programming experience     A good understanding of continuous delivery, writing unit tests and automated testing      Comfort working on multiple tiers of modern applications, frontend and backend       Understanding how the web works and how to make it efficient (HTTP, caching, page rendering, sockets, etc)        Interest in design, not only in the product and visual sense, but also in coding and technical architecture       Ability to communicate to technical and non-technical audiences    Experience in a substantial proportion of the following technologies:    Scala + Akka for JSON API development    Java (1.8 min) + SpringBoot for JSON API development    AWS: SES, S3, Jenkins,    Javascript with React for UI development    Excellent knowledge of J2EE architecture and design patterns    Object Oriented Design methodologies   Solid knowledge of OOP    Knowledge of functional software concepts   What we offer in return:   24 days annual leave    4 volunteering days annually   Day off for your birthday     Medical insurance for self and dependants; life cover and personal accident cover for self     Seasonal social and charitable events   Blended style and flexi working time   Right tools for remote working
